pullRequest.title: Error on bad shape relations in runtime fields
pullRequest.bodyText:
Most core types throw back an error if the relation on a range query
is disjoint. This make runtime fields do the same.
Relates to #59332

commit.message:
Error on bad shape relations in runtime fields

Most core types throw back an error if the `relation` on a `range` query
is `disjoint`. This make runtime fields do the same.

nodes.bodyText: I went with this rather funny way of writing the message because it made the formatter happy. Most of the other options I tried caused the formatter to split the message over so many lines it wasn't readable. I don't generally like String.format for these but here it looks best, I think.
